successes.title: Limeade Blast 18,000mAh Ultra-High Capacity Battery Pack
successes.description: Ultra-high 18000mAh capacity portable external battery pack with built-in 5V/2A input speed charge.

Pledges.description: No pledge is too small, everything helps!  We will personally thank you via Twitter or Facebook!
One 2-in-1 micro/30-pin USB cable, white, 2.5ft (0.8m).  Free US Shipping! Thank you for your support!
One 5V/4.2A (2.1A + 2.1A) 21 watts USB wall charger, white. Free US Shipping! Thank you for your support!
L130X (Early Bird Special):  Includes one 13000mAh battery pack and one 2-in-1 micro/30-pin USB cable.  Free US shipping!
L130X:  Includes one 13000mAh battery pack and one 2-in-1 micro/30-pin USB cable.  Free US shipping!
L180X (Early Bird Special): Includes one 18000mAh battery pack and one 2-in-1 micro/30-pin USB cable. Free US shipping!
L156X: Includes one 15600mAh battery pack and one 2-in-1 micro/30-pin USB cable. Free US shipping!
L180X (Early Bird Extended!) Includes one 18000mAh battery pack and one 2-in-1 micro/30-pin USB cable. Free US shipping! **International shipping price updated. Not valid with Update #1- May 2, 2013.
L180X: Includes one 18000mAh battery pack and one 2-in-1 micro/30-pin USB cable.  Free US shipping!

L180X + 4.2A USB Wall Charger (Speed Charge Pack): Includes one 18000mAh battery pack, one 2-in-1 micro/30-pin USB cable, and one 5V/4.2A (2.1A + 2.1A) 21 watts USB wall charger.  Free US shipping! **Battery pack and charger will be delivered separately. L180X delivers late June, USB wall charger will ship late July.
